fields.Title: THOUGHT / SORRY COP
fields.Description:
Suggestion tells you all about being a Sorry Cop.

... I am SORRY!!! Sorry for everything! Sorry for being *me*!

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Hey, so we've been monitoring you i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hey, so we've been monitoring you internally, and now we know your *copotype*.

fields.Title: You: "Cool cop?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Cool cop?

fields.Title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Discard thought.]

fields.Title: You: "Some kind of... weapon-cop?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Some kind of... weapon-cop?

fields.Title: You: "I'm sorry you had to monitor me."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm sorry you had to monitor me.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: IsTHCPresent("apocalypse_cop") == false  and  IsTHCPresent("superstar_cop") == false  and  IsTHCPresent("boring_cop") == false

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Guess."
fields.Dialogue Text: Guess.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "No, you're the *Sorry Cop*. The cop..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, you're the *Sorry Cop*. The cop who's sorriest. Let's make it official, then, shall we?

fields.Title: You: "I was kinda hoping I'm the Apocalyp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I was kinda hoping I'm the Apocalypse Cop.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Huge lack of enthusiasm going on in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Huge lack of enthusiasm going on in here.

fields.Title: You: "I was kinda hoping I'm the Supersta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I was kinda hoping I'm the Superstar Cop.

fields.Title: You: "Uhm, won't the other copotypes be j..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Uhm, won't the other copotypes be jealous?

fields.Title: Half Light: "Check out the big balls on Fire Cop..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Check out the big balls on Fire Cop...

fields.Title: You: "Sorry cop? I'm sorry, I'm not sure...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sorry cop? I'm sorry, I'm not sure...

fields.Title: You: "I was kinda thinking I'm the Regula..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I was kinda thinking I'm the Regular Cop.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Yes. Guess what's yours?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. Guess what's yours?

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Oh, you know. Apocalypse, Superstel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, you know. Apocalypse, Superstellar, The Advanced Interesting Cop. Liquid Shadow Cop. But you're too sorry to say those things, so -- here we go?

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "They'll be super, super fine. It'll..."
fields.Dialogue Text: They'll be super, super fine. It'll be totally *okay*. You can dual-copotype from sorry to anything.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Okay, just for the length of this s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay, just for the length of this short demonstration, please say something that isn't *I'm sorry*. Guess. What is it?

fields.Title: You: "Okay, okay, but what are the *other..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay, okay, but what are the *other* copotypes?

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: IsTHCPresent("apocalypse_cop") == false  and  IsTHCPresent("superstar_cop") == false  and  IsTHCPresent("boring_cop") == false

fields.Title: You: "Fuckin'... *they* should be sorry!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Fuckin'... *they* should be sorry!

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Of course you are. It's okay. See i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course you are. It's okay. See if you can get something out of this. Like... info, or... maybe every time you say you're sorry you get a million bucks?

fields.Title: Suggestion: "That is only a ludicrous daydream...."
fields.Dialogue Text: That is only a ludicrous daydream. Guess again. You're the...

fields.Title: You: "Okay. What am I?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay. What am I?

fields.Title: Logic: "That won't happen."
fields.Dialogue Text: That won't happen.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Yes. Sorry Cop. The cop who's sorri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. Sorry Cop. The cop who's sorriest. Let's make it official, then, shall we?

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Yes-yes, impotent rage and lamentat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes-yes, impotent rage and lamentation. Let's wrap it up?

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Wow. Okay. *Fuck off*? Maybe we wer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wow. Okay. *Fuck off*? Maybe we were wrong about you then...

fields.Title: You: "I'm sorry. (Opt in.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm sorry. (Opt in.)

fields.Title: Suggestion: "No, you don't. C'mon. You'll be bac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, you don't. C'mon. You'll be back to saying sorry in two minutes. Stop wasting time and begin The Repentance.

fields.Title: You: "Wait, there are *copotypes*?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, there are *copotypes*?

fields.Title: You: "No. I'm *really* not sorry. Fuck of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. I'm *really* not sorry. Fuck off! (Opt out.)

fields.Title: Suggestion: "What? Jealous of the *Sorry Cop*? I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What? Jealous of the *Sorry Cop*? I think they'll be fine. Don't worry.

fields.Title: You: "You know, actually I'm *not* sorry...."
fields.Dialogue Text: You know, actually I'm *not* sorry. I change my mind.
